content.description:
Soror, rogo ut ad diem natalemnatalis, -e, adj.: related to birth meum venias, iucundioremiucundus, -a, -um, adj.: pleasing 
mihi diem factura, si venies.
content.question: In the sentence, what does venies mean?

skill.text: 1.A: Identify the meaning of Latin words and phrases.
